title: Are any of you silver idiots having trouble vs Ekko?
body:
Just play Yasuo, absolute hard couner to Ekko, Ekko has no way dealing with Yasuo, Yasuo can dodge every Q with his dash, if that fails windwall, if that fails he still has the shield, yasuo will heavily out damage Ekko in every situation, u can easily zone ekko as yasuo becaue if ekko tried to farm with AA's all Yasuo has to do is e through minions onto him and take half his hp bar while ekko cant do anything in return, it's not even worth Ekko using his E for damage because he will just take more from Yasuo in lane trades by jumping to him, The 3 stack proc and run lane harrass trick is basically useless since Yasuo cares little for movement speed and will just dash towards you as you sprint off and smack the sht out of you, once six comes it doesn't get any better, Yasuo has lane full of minions to fly around on Good luck ever hitting your ultimate, and Yasuo can easily use his ultimate as a decent execute forcing Ekko to ultimate before he's even very low as he can't ult one Yasuo has begun his ult.

Yasuo can easily force Ekko in to a situation that leaves him dead even if he ults, have the tornado procced, dash towards him, forcing him to either get dashed on knocked up and ulted and dead, or ultimate back towards your turret as he will be running away from you towards his leaving his shadow behind, leaving him also dead because you will then just e through all the enemy minions behind you and catch him.

replies.body:
I'm in love with riven when someone picks ekko 1 combo and more then 2/3 of his health gone. easy dodge his q with her e and q and when he goes in w and if he fights you he has to ult out. But then again when playing riven you have to watch when his 6 and where is clone is he can burst you down when you get hit by it. 
I know I'm going to look like a fag but yeh riven
Yes you do look like one.

I've found lux is also a brilliant counter. She has an easily landed slow, and a snare, with a HUGE damage ult. The slows and snares do insane amounts of damage to him, forcing him to ult to live, and then i go for the kill with a snare>ult combo.

Might have just been a bad ekko, but good positioning and landing your skillshots with lux means ehe has absolutely no chance to use his E and if you avoid his other abilities you're laughing.
Doesn't Ekko just dash out of everything?
das a nice dash ekko can i do that every .2 seconds :-) ~ Yasuo

If you've slowed him with the E, no, you can generally tag him with your Q afterwards. If you've landed Q, definitely no, you've got him snared.

Yeah he can give you dome hassle with his dash, but it's the best counter i've seen so far.

I mean with Ekko's E he has two mobility abilities in one that counters two of Lux's only CC abilities.

Ekko places himself adjacent to an enemy minion. You throw out one CC ability, he dashes to dodge that. You throw out your second, he blinks to the adjacent minion or blink to you past your snare if he's close enough.

I think you're just playing against bad Ekkos. If Ekko is smart he won't engage Lux unless her snare is on CD.
